data.name: Sudden Demise
data.oracle_text: Choose a color. Sudden Demise deals X damage to each creature of the chosen color.
data.flavor_text: In the Skyfang Mountains, one misstep can mean the end of an entire clan.

data.name: Suffocating Fumes
data.oracle_text:
Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
data.flavor_text:
"Yesterday it was flying tigers and crumbling bridges. Who knows what today will bring?"
—Dol, Lavabrink quartermaster

data.name: Sulfurous Blast
data.oracle_text: Sulfurous Blast deals 2 damage to each creature and each player. If you cast this spell during your main phase, Sulfurous Blast deals 3 damage to each creature and each player instead.
data.flavor_text: The Keldons used the toxic vents in the cracked earth to bolster their home's defenses.

data.name: Sunscour
data.oracle_text:
You may exile two white cards from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Destroy all creatures.

data.name: Supreme Verdict
data.oracle_text:
This spell can't be countered.
Destroy all creatures.
data.flavor_text: Leonos had no second thoughts about the abolishment edict. He'd left skyrunes warning of the eviction, even though it was cloudy.

data.name: Supreme Verdict
data.oracle_text:
This spell can't be countered.
Destroy all creatures.
data.flavor_text:
"I'll grant that the siege engines are gone, but do you think that might have been a bit of overkill?"
—Sergeant Malsworth

data.name: Supreme Verdict
data.oracle_text:
This spell can't be countered.
Destroy all creatures.
data.flavor_text: Leonos had no second thoughts about the abolishment edict. He'd left skyrunes warning of the eviction, even though it was cloudy.

data.name: Sweltering Suns
data.oracle_text:
Sweltering Suns deals 3 damage to each creature.
Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
data.flavor_text: The Hekma may repel storms and monsters, but nothing holds back the heat of the suns.

data.name: Swirling Sandstorm
data.oracle_text: Threshold — Swirling Sandstorm deals 5 damage to each creature without flying if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
data.flavor_text: As dust swept out, vultures swept in.

data.name: Synthetic Destiny
data.oracle_text: Exile all creatures you control. At the beginning of the next end step, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal that many creature cards, put all creature cards revealed this way onto the battlefield, then shuffle the rest of the revealed cards into your library.
data.flavor_text: To Jin-Gitaxias, perfection is not a goal, but a process.

data.name: Take Down
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Take Down deals 4 damage to target creature with flying.
• Take Down deals 1 damage to each creature with flying.
data.flavor_text: The drake flew true. The arrow flew truer.

data.name: Terminus
data.oracle_text:
Put all creatures on the bottom of their owners' libraries.
Miracle {W} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

data.name: Thunder of Hooves
data.oracle_text: Thunder of Hooves deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player, where X is the number of Beasts on the battlefield.

data.name: Thunderwave
data.oracle_text:
Roll a d20.
1—9 | Thunderwave deals 3 damage to each creature.
10—19 | You may choose a creature. Thunderwave deals 3 damage to each creature not chosen this way.
20 | Thunderwave deals 6 damage to each creature your opponents control.
data.set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

data.name: Time Wipe
data.oracle_text: Return a creature you control to its owner's hand, then destroy all creatures.
data.flavor_text:
"To comprehend the full answer requires years of temporal study. In short, they were now never born in the first place."
—Teferi

data.name: Time Wipe
data.oracle_text: Return a creature you control to its owner's hand, then destroy all creatures.

data.name: Tivadar's Crusade
data.oracle_text: Destroy all Goblins.

data.name: Torrent of Lava
data.oracle_text:
Torrent of Lava deals X damage to each creature without flying.
As long as Torrent of Lava is on the stack, each creature has "{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to this creature by Torrent of Lava this turn."
data.flavor_text: The mountain's voice shouts us all down.

data.name: Toxic Deluge
data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay X life.
All creatures get -X/-X until end of turn.
data.flavor_text:
"I am greater than rain and nourishment. I am glistening oil and perfection."
—Yawgmoth

data.name: Toxic Deluge
data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay X life.
All creatures get -X/-X until end of turn.
data.flavor_text:
"It's a difficult task to quarantine a plague that moves with the clouds."
—Esara, healer adept

data.name: Toxic Deluge
data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay X life.
All creatures get -X/-X until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: Armor dissolved into flesh. Flesh melted to bone. Bone fell away to nothing.

data.name: Tremor
data.oracle_text: Tremor deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
data.flavor_text: Where do you run when the earth becomes your enemy?

data.name: Tremor
data.oracle_text: Tremor deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
data.flavor_text: Without a word, Gerrard and Sisay ran deeper into the mountain. Neither of them intended to leave Mercadia without the *Weatherlight* and its crew.

data.name: Tremor
data.oracle_text: Tremor deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
data.flavor_text: One little goblin shook up the ground. When the dust cleared, no one was found.

data.name: Tremor
data.oracle_text: Tremor deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
data.flavor_text:
"Where do you run when the earth becomes your enemy?"
—Naimah, Femeref philosopher

data.name: Tropical Storm
data.oracle_text: Tropical Storm deals X damage to each creature with flying and 1 additional damage to each blue creature.
data.flavor_text:
"After the storm, I found a sea turtle dying on the sands, a blade of grass driven through its shell."
—*Travelogue of Najat*

data.name: Tsabo's Decree
data.oracle_text: Choose a creature type. Target player reveals their hand and discards all creature cards of that type. Then destroy all creatures of that type that player controls. They can't be regenerated.

data.name: Underworld Fires
data.oracle_text: Underworld Fires deals 1 damage to each creature and each planeswalker. If a permanent dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
data.flavor_text: The Underworld is anything but a resting place.

data.name: Urborg Justice
data.oracle_text: Target opponent sacrifices a creature for each creature put into your graveyard from the battlefield this turn.
data.flavor_text:
"It is a narrow line between justice and vengeance."
—Crovax

data.name: Valiant Endeavor
data.oracle_text: Roll two d6 and choose one result. Destroy each creature with power greater than or equal to that result. Then create a number of 2/2 white Knight creature tokens with vigilance equal to the other result.
data.flavor_text: "Only victory shall stop our charge!"

data.name: Vampires' Vengeance
data.oracle_text: Vampires' Vengeance deals 2 damage to each non-Vampire creature. Create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
data.flavor_text: Olivia was quick to make an example of any village that refused to pay her blood tithe.

data.name: Vampires' Vengeance
data.oracle_text: Vampires' Vengeance deals 2 damage to each non-Vampire creature. Create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
data.flavor_text: She was ghastly, chalkily pale; the red seemed to have gone even from her lips and gums, and the bones of her face stood out prominently; her breathing was painful to see or hear.

data.name: Vanquish the Horde
data.oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature on the battlefield.
Destroy all creatures.
data.flavor_text: Odric took no joy in violence but neither did he mourn for the twisted things he dispatched. All that mattered were the lives he had saved.

data.name: Virtue's Ruin
data.oracle_text: Destroy all white creatures.
data.flavor_text: All must fall, and those who stand highest fall hardest.

data.name: Void
data.oracle_text: Choose a number. Destroy all artifacts and creatures with mana value equal to that number. Then target player reveals their hand and discards all nonland cards with mana value equal to the number.

data.name: Void
data.oracle_text: Choose a number. Destroy all artifacts and creatures with mana value equal to that number. Then target player reveals their hand and discards all nonland cards with mana value equal to the number.

data.name: Volcanic Eruption

—Hadran, sunseeder of Naya

data.name: Volcanic Fallout
data.oracle_text:
This spell can't be countered.

data.name: Volcanic Spray

data.name: Volcanic Torrent
data.oracle_text:
Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)
Volcanic Torrent deals X damage to each creature and planeswalker your opponents control, where X is the number of spells you've cast this turn.

data.name: Volcanic Vision
data.oracle_text: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. Volcanic Vision deals damage equal to that card's mana value to each creature your opponents control. Exile Volcanic Vision.

data.oracle_text: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. Volcanic Vision deals damage equal to that card's mana value to each creature your opponents control. Exile Volcanic Vision.

data.name: Wave of Reckoning
data.oracle_text: Each creature deals damage to itself equal to its power.
data.flavor_text: We shall suffer turmoil equal to that which we have wrought, whether in this life or the next.

data.name: Wave of Reckoning
data.oracle_text: Each creature deals damage to itself equal to its power.
data.flavor_text: Inner conflict can defeat a soldier more quickly than any army.

data.name: Whelming Wave
data.oracle_text: Return all creatures to their owners' hands except for Krakens, Leviathans, Octopuses, and Serpents.
data.flavor_text:
"I can see why this appeals to Thassa."
—Kiora

data.name: Whipflare
data.oracle_text: Whipflare deals 2 damage to each nonartifact creature.
data.flavor_text: The slag-workers wasted no time in creating their own flare pulses to cleanse the area of the *incompleat*.

data.name: Whirlwind
data.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures with flying.
data.flavor_text: Urza tried to rule the air, but Gaea taught him that she controlled all the elements.

data.name: Widespread Brutality
data.oracle_text: Amass 2, then the Army you amassed deals damage equal to its power to each non-Army creature. (To amass 2, put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

data.name: Wildfire
data.oracle_text: Each player sacrifices four lands. Wildfire deals 4 damage to each creature.
data.flavor_text: Fire is always at the top of the food chain, and it has a *big* appetite.
